original: ma tsa la matsa la sv'a h'a /

original: lan bdun brjod de 'phags pa 'jam dpal la gsol ba btab na mi thams cad byams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan bdun brjod de 'phags pa 'jam dpal la gsol ba btab na mi thams cad byams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Reciting this seven times and supplicating Noble Mañjuśrī, all people will become loving.

original: 'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////

translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī called Pacification of All Hatreds is complete.
